title: Basic Algebra
description: Test your understanding of basic algebraic concepts including variables, equations, and simple problem solving.
subject: Mathematics

questions.text: What is the value of x in the equation 2x + 5 = 13?
If y = 2x + 3 and x = 4, what is the value of y?

title: Cell Biology Fundamentals
description: Explore the basic structure and function of cells, including organelles and cellular processes.
subject: Biology

questions.text: Which organelle is known as the 'powerhouse of the cell'?
What is the function of the cell membrane?
options: Controlling what enters and leaves the cell

questions.text: Which process allows plants to make their own food?

title: World War II Timeline
description: Test your knowledge of major events, dates, and figures from World War II.
subject: History

questions.text: When did World War II officially begin?
Which battle is considered the turning point in the Pacific Theater?

title: Grammar Basics
description: Review fundamental English grammar rules including parts of speech, sentence structure, and punctuation.
subject: English

questions.text: Which of the following is a proper noun?
What type of sentence is this: 'Please close the door.'

title: Chemical Reactions
description: Understand the basics of chemical reactions, including types of reactions and balancing equations.
subject: Chemistry

questions.text: What is the chemical formula for water?
In a chemical equation, what do the coefficients represent?

title: Forces and Motion
description: Explore Newton's laws of motion and fundamental concepts of physics including force, acceleration, and momentum.
subject: Physics

questions.text: What is Newton's first law of motion also known as?
If a force of 10N is applied to an object with mass 2kg, what is its acceleration?
